level.text: The facility shall coordinate with the contracting entity and, where applicable, the CSSD to ensure that each resident has his or her own adequate and appropriate seasonable clothing and footwear.

Where the facility provides residents a clothing allowance, the facility shall provide the resident a clothing allowance on a regular and timely basis and notify the resident when the clothing allowance will be provided.
The facility shall involve the resident in the selection of clothing, as appropriate to the resident’s age and level of development.
The facility shall coordinate with the contracting entity and, where applicable, the CSSD to permit each resident to take his or her clothing upon discharge from the facility.
